blog.name: phanfictionevents
blog.title: Phanfiction Events
blog.description:
We host various events for writers in the phandom! From prompt weeks to blind-gos to remixes (and more), there's something for everyone!

Current Event | FAQ

summary: Remix Relay: Prompt #1 emails have been sent out!
title: Remix Relay: Prompt #1 emails have been sent out!
body: Check your emails, writers! We’ve just sent the first prompt, which you’re free to begin writing as soon as you can! If for some reason you haven’t gotten it or are unable to access your email, just drop us an ask (or message any of us admins) and we’ll send it to you via Tumblr! Have fun!

reblog.comment: Check your emails, writers! We’ve just sent the first prompt, which you’re free to begin writing as soon as you can! If for some reason you haven’t gotten it or are unable to access your email, just drop us an ask (or message any of us admins) and we’ll send it to you via Tumblr! Have fun!

trail.content_raw: Check your emails, writers! We’ve just sent the first prompt, which you’re free to begin writing as soon as you can! If for some reason you haven’t gotten it or are unable to access your email, just drop us an ask (or message any of us admins) and we’ll send it to you via Tumblr! Have fun!
trail.content: Check your emails, writers! We’ve just sent the first prompt, which you’re free to begin writing as soon as you can! If for some reason you haven’t gotten it or are unable to access your email, just drop us an ask (or message any of us admins) and we’ll send it to you via Tumblr! Have fun!

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I really loved phil's fringe when his hair was longer and messier (2008-2012), and it only started looking bad/blocky in 2017...
question: I really loved phil's fringe when his hair was longer and messier (2008-2012), and it only started looking bad/blocky in 2017 because he kept killing it with his straighteners and clearly wanted to get rid of it (the fringe). all his hair needs is less straightening and more volume. btw, I don't think his hairline looks that different from how it is in this picture, but maybe i'm wrong lol instagram(.)com/p/BcDZaYKhNlH/
answer: I think a shorter version of old school bird nest hair might not be terrible. But I feel like it would be hard to manage. And I know he’s probably not actually balding, but Idk if it’s the way he styles it sometimes or a trick of the light but sometimes it just don’t look right.

reblog.comment: I think a shorter version of old school bird nest hair might not be terrible. But I feel like it would be hard to manage. And I know he’s probably not actually balding, but Idk if it’s the way he styles it sometimes or a trick of the light but sometimes it just don’t look right.

trail.content_raw: I think a shorter version of old school bird nest hair might not be terrible. But I feel like it would be hard to manage. And I know he’s probably not actually balding, but Idk if it’s the way he styles it sometimes or a trick of the light but sometimes it just don’t look right.
trail.content: I think a shorter version of old school bird nest hair might not be terrible. But I feel like it would be hard to manage. And I know he’s probably not actually balding, but Idk if it’s the way he styles it sometimes or a trick of the light but sometimes it just don’t look right.

summary: Unpopular opinion: I hate quiff. It's such a boring and bland hairstyle and a lot of the time it looks somehow off to me....
question: Unpopular opinion: I hate quiff. It's such a boring and bland hairstyle and a lot of the time it looks somehow off to me. Fringes are cute as heck and I was devastated when he changed his hair. But Phil loves his quiff and that's all that matters really, so I'll just suck it up.
answer: This has some spice to it. Personally, I prefer the quiff. But I think there’s a middle ground that would be super cool. Not all the way down like the fringe but not all the way up either. Kind of like the way he had it during the mukbang, where it’s still a quiff, but it’s not overly styled. Just kinda lazily pushed up. That’s my fave Phil hair.

reblog.comment: This has some spice to it. Personally, I prefer the quiff. But I think there’s a middle ground that would be super cool. Not all the way down like the fringe but not all the way up either. Kind of like the way he had it during the mukbang, where it’s still a quiff, but it’s not overly styled. Just kinda lazily pushed up. That’s my fave Phil hair.

Not all the way down like the fringe but not all the way up either. Kind of like the way he had it during the mukbang, where it’s still a quiff, but it’s not overly styled. Just kinda lazily pushed up. That’s my fave Phil hair.

Not all the way down like the fringe but not all the way up either. Kind of like the way he had it during the mukbang, where it’s still a quiff, but it’s not overly styled. Just kinda lazily pushed up. That’s my fave Phil hair.
